title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Brazil 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, gradually increasing from 2018 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The line significantly increased by 1.16 from Year 2019 to 2020.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 3.31 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.88 was reported at Year 2019
min_summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

max_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, gradually increasing from 2018 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 3.31 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.88 was reported at Year 2019
The line rapidly increased by 131.82% from Year 2019 to 2020.
